experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Objective: To minimize human intervention in resolving issues faced by users with the help of Artificial Intelligence• Developed an NLP-powered chatbot utilizing Python-based RASA framework to engage users, comprehend queries, and offer solutions from historical data; seamlessly generating support tickets when needed.• Automated ticket creation on the JIRA platform, boosting speed by 400% and achieving a 92% accuracy rate.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Objective: Utilizing OCR and NLP to categorize non-selectable documents into groups, upholding stringent quality standards• Utilized Optical Character Recognition to train a model in extracting entities and values from documents.• Executed an NLP classifier on pre-processed data, achieving 84% accuracy in categorizing non-selectable documents.
